metadata.title: CVE-2024-6716 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libtiff. This flaw allows an attacker to create acrafted tiff file, forcing libtiff to allocate memory indefinitely. Thisissue can result in a denial of service of the system consuming libtiff dueto memory starvation.

criterions.comment: tiff package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-07-15').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
neuron package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
